front.title: Time Protocol Servers and Time Offset Options for IPv6 DHCP

abstract.t: The Time Protocol Servers option for IPv6 DHCP (RFC 3315) carries theIPv6 addresses of servers that a host should use for the TimeProtocol (RFC 868). The Time Offset option carries the offset inseconds from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that a client may useto determine its local time.
